originalText.text: Trina has been a fantastic agent.  She is very profesional, knowledgeable and well informed about real estate in New York.  She made the experience of buying for the first time in New York very smooth and pleasant.  In reality we felt very lucky we found her and could not have been in better hands.  Her advice and knowledge was spot on.  Thank you Trina

Her advice and knowledge was spot on.  Thank you Trina

originalText.text: Selling your home can be a complicated and emotional experience, but Trina made it easy and less stressful. She was a pleasure to work with: knowledgable, experienced, and a great sense of humor.  It was easy to trust her recommendations/judgement when it came to staging my apartment for promotional photos, deciding on an asking price, and planning open houses. My apartment had 3 offers after only 18 days on the market.

text.text: Selling your home can be a complicated and emotional experience, but Trina made it easy and less stressful. My apartment had 3 offers after only 18 days on the market.

originalText.text:
We had the absolute pleasure of working with Trina throughout the intricate journey of purchasing our new apartment, and we cannot sing her praises enough. Trina's communication skills are truly exceptional - she was always just a phone call or email away, ready to address our questions and concerns with patience and clarity.

But it's not just her communication skills that set her apart; it's her warm and welcoming personality that made the entire process so enjoyable. Trina's positive attitude and genuine care for our needs created a sense of trust and ease right from the start.

Trina guided us every step of the way with expertise and grace, ensuring that we were well-informed and confident in our decisions.

In short, Trina's remarkable communication skills, wonderful personality, and unwavering dedication turned what could have been a stressful experience into a smooth and enjoyable one. If you're in need of a real estate professional who goes above and beyond, look no further than Trina.
We couldn't be happier with our new apartment, thanks to her.

originalText.text: Had the best experience with Trina! I was a first-time home buyer who went into the experience wanting to see what was on the market. I started looking on StreetEasy and connected with Trina when I reached out about going to the open house. Even though I informed that I was just looking around, Trina went above and beyond to really listen to what I was looking for and find many multiple options (she was also receptive to listings that I found which I greatly appreciated). Not only that, because I had zero knowledge, she spent a lot of time helping me understand the process especially with co-ops. It was all overwhelming and she was very patient with me. I ended up finding a unicorn. I found a co-op alcove studio in lower Manhattan for a little over half a million with maintenance less than $1.5K that I converted into a one bedroom. My apartment renewal lease was going to be almost on par with my mortgage + maintenance. Knowing I wanted to live in NYC for the rest of my life, this was the best decision ever from a financial and comfort perspective. I don't know if this will be my forever home but if I'm ever on the market again, I will undoubtedly reach back out to Trina. I hope I get the opportunity to work with her again in the future.

originalText.text: Highly recommend Trina.  She was fantastic and pleasant to partner with throughout my journey finding my dream apartment. Great advice, no pressure, straight shooter. Thanks!
